title: Lovely serif. Any ideas?
content:
Good afternoon,  
Does anyone have any ideas as to what this may be?  
Thanks you.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [whatfont.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106081842/http:/typophile.com/files/whatfont_6.png) | 72.31 KB |
author: nickplant

comments.content: This font is simply called "Clarins" and should have been designed by [Jean-François Rappo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106081842/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/case/453267) (thanks to Akira1975!), so, unfortunately, not available to sell.
